title: Create Kanhaiya Sweet House website with menu, order form, and contact sections

requirements.text: Create header section with business name 'Kanhaiya Sweet House' and tagline 'Pure & Fresh Indian Sweets in Karhal' using orange gradient background (#ff6f00 to #ff9800)
acceptanceCriteria: Header displays 'Kanhaiya Sweet House' as main heading
Tagline 'Pure & Fresh Indian Sweets in Karhal' appears below heading
Background uses linear gradient from #ff6f00 to #ff9800
Text is white and center-aligned

requirements.text: Implement navigation menu with links to About, Menu, Order, and Contact sections using anchor navigation (#about, #menu, #order, #contact)
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation bar contains four links: About, Menu, Order, Contact
Links are styled with white text on #e65100 background
Clicking each link scrolls to corresponding section
Navigation is horizontally centered

requirements.text: Create About section with heading 'About Us' and description text 'Welcome to Kanhaiya Sweet House. We serve fresh and delicious sweets made with pure ingredients.'
acceptanceCriteria: Section has id='about' for anchor navigation
Displays 'About Us' as section heading
Shows welcome text with business description
Content is center-aligned

requirements.text: Create Menu section displaying three sweet items: Laddu (₹400/kg), Kaju Katli (₹900/kg), and Gulab Jamun (₹350/kg), each in white card containers with rounded corners and shadow
acceptanceCriteria: Section has id='menu' and heading 'Our Special Menu'
Three menu items are displayed: Laddu, Kaju Katli, Gulab Jamun
Each item shows name and price per kg in Indian Rupees
Cards have white background, 10px border-radius, and subtle shadow
Cards are centered with 250px width

requirements.text: Create Order section with form containing name input, mobile number input, order details textarea, and submit button styled with orange (#ff6f00) background
acceptanceCriteria: Section has id='order' and heading 'Place Your Order'
Form includes text input with placeholder 'Your Name'
Form includes text input with placeholder 'Mobile Number'
Form includes textarea with placeholder 'Order Details'
Submit button displays 'Submit Order' with #ff6f00 background and white text
Inputs are 80% width with consistent padding

requirements.text: Create Contact section displaying address 'XR25+GFX, Meethepur, Karhal, 206245' and embedded Google Maps iframe using the provided map URL
acceptanceCriteria: Section has id='contact' and heading 'Visit Us'
Address 'XR25+GFX, Meethepur, Karhal, 206245' is displayed
Google Maps iframe embeds with src='https://www.google.com/maps?q=XR25+GFX,Karhal&output=embed'
Map is 80% width and 250px height with no border
Content is center-aligned

requirements.text: Create footer section with copyright text '© 2026 Kanhaiya Sweet House | Karhal' on dark background (#333)
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays copyright notice with year 2026
Background color is #333 with white text
Text is center-aligned

requirements.text: Apply warm color scheme with cream background (#fff3e0), orange gradient header, and maintain the exact styling specifications from the provided HTML including spacing, typography, and responsive design
acceptanceCriteria: Page background is #fff3e0 (cream/light orange)
All sections use 30px padding
Typography uses Arial sans-serif font family
Viewport meta tag ensures mobile responsiveness
All colors match the provided specification

constraints: Use exact color values: #fff3e0 background, #ff6f00 to #ff9800 header gradient, #e65100 navigation, #333 footer
Maintain Indian Rupee (₹) currency symbol for all prices
Preserve exact menu items and prices: Laddu ₹400/kg, Kaju Katli ₹900/kg, Gulab Jamun ₹350/kg
Use exact address: XR25+GFX, Meethepur, Karhal, 206245
Embed Google Maps with provided URL: https://www.google.com/maps?q=XR25+GFX,Karhal&output=embed

required: Indian sweets assortment hero image featuring laddu, kaju katli, and gulab jamun on traditional platter with warm lighting (hero-sweets.dim_1200x400.png)
Decorative traditional Indian motif border pattern in orange and gold tones (border-pattern.dim_800x100.png)
